meta_keywords: 1925 America:  Famous Events - Ku Klux Klan march; Scopes Trial; Bryan Obituary
data.meta_description: 1925 America:  Famous Events - Ku Klux Klan march; Scopes Trial; Bryan Obituary
data.text: 1925 America: Famous Events - Ku Klux Klan march; Scopes Trial; Bryan Obituary KKK parade in Washington, DC w/ Klansmen riding down Pennsylvania AVenue. Large delegation marching w/ American flags. High angle of parade from Capitol to White House. Members carry flags, march in shape of Cross. Marchers in sheets & caps pass large crowd of Klan & others lining street; march w/ state banners “Rhode Island Convention“. Float past w/ Miss 100% America, Paterson, NJ. Klan with huge American flag onto mall under dark skies. Members assembled at base of Washington Monument; Uncle Sam costume. NOTE: rally was rained out. 19:24:40 Woman w/ pennant over shoulder at Scopes Trial, Dayton, Tennessee. Ext. Robinson’s Drug store where George Rappleyea convinced business men to challenge the Butler Act; two men pass on sidewalk; man in straw hat in CU (John T. Scopes). Courthouse clock tower, people outside on lawn sitting & laying. CU of William Jennings Bryan. DTrain into station. CU of Clarence Darrow shaking hands w/ Scopes. 19:25:58 Pan over people waiting in shade outside of courthouse. 19:26:28 Baptist preacher William Bell Riley (?) w/ bible on street. Man wearing jacket or shirt w/ Champion Bible on back. William Jennings Bryan & others men posing. Clarence Darrow & men posing. Lawyers into courthouse. 19:27:36 Men in courthouse w/ fans. Reporters. People sitting on floor & standing around back. 19:28:04 CU of Monkey watch fob medallion hanging from belt. 19:28:20 Teenage girl playing w/ monkey doll. 19:28:36 Fox News story of Bryan death. CU Bryan. Shots of crowd at on lawn under palm trees listening to Bryan speaking from porch of ? View from behind him as he gestures. Walking in rain in Washington D, stops & tips hat. Celebrities; Lawyers; Evolution; Creationism; Racism; Religion; Right Wing;
